subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jamal Crawford bested both Shaquille O’Neal and Dwyane Wade Friday night, scoring a career-high 52 points. During one stretch, Crawford made 16 straight shots, half of them 3-pointers.
snippet: Jamal Crawford bested both Shaquille O’Neal and Dwyane Wade Friday night, scoring a career-high 52 points. During one stretch, Crawford made 16 straight shots, half of them 3-pointers.
